column1: "summary": "Specialising in project risk management and the strategic implementation of project management
column2: I am passionate about working within organizations to maximise their project portfolio investment.\n\nAmongst my many interests the commercialization of space takes up much of my spare time. In particular I am attracted to projects that can make the colonization of Mars a reality
column3: but also anything from Space Tourism to Space Mining or associated technologies involving teleoperations."
